taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family asteraceae;tribe heliantheae;subtribe rudbeckiinae;genus rudbeckia;section macrocline;species laciniata

bio:treatment.description: Leaves: basal 15–40 × 10–25 cm, blades pinnately compound to pinnatifid; proximal and mid cauline blades 5–9-lobed (distal cauline 3-lobed or not lobed); adaxial leaf faces glabrous or sparsely hairy. Receptacles globose to ovoid; paleae 4.4–6.1 mm. Ray laminae 20–45 × 7–18 mm. Discs 15–20 × 10–20 mm. Cypselae 4.2–6 mm; pappi to 0.7 mm. 2n = 36, 54.
